value:
$WmMPID_春祭マリカ,ch08_11_Marica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Whoa! Too high! Go lower... No,
not like that.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_SpringFes19,Face|Is this your first ride on a pegasus?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリカ,ch08_11_Marica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Yes... I've seen one before. Up close.
A friend of mine rides one.$k$pDon't worry. This is my job now, and
I'll do it.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_SpringFes19,Face|Be gentle. The pegasus has opened
its heart to you...$k$pNow, if you open your heart...your
hearts will join together and soar
into the sky!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリカ,ch08_11_Marica_F_SpringFes19,Face|I see.$k$pBoth you and my friend... You're very
close to your pegasi.$k$pI would like to be, too... I'll do my
best.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_SpringFes19,Face|If you just try...I know you can do it.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_春祭マリカ,ch08_11_Marica_F_SpringFes19,Face|We lost. But it's not over. Not yet.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_SpringFes19,Face|We'll retreat for now and come up
with a new plan.$k$p$Sbs150|
